description: figure kneeling on PL knee, with drapery over PR knee; drapery fully finished--figure lightly sketched; squared off in a grid with numbers
medium: Black and white chalk, squared, on blue paper
provenance: [R. Waller Antiquarian, Paris, about 1960; sold to Moir]; Alfred Moir, Santa Barbara (about 1960-d. 2010; bequeathed to MIA)
title: Drapery Study
